Issues.Title: Remove CLSCompliant from all binaries in WinForms repo
Issues.Body:
As per feedback received from @sharwell in the refout PR, we should remove usage of CLSCompliant attribute from all binaries in WinForms repo. This concept is now obsolete and is not required anymore. Its drawback is that it slows the build.

However in order to remove it from WinForms repo, it needs to be removed from WindowsFormsIntegration first in DotNet-Trusted.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Remove CLSCompliant from all binaries in WinForms repo" (#621)

Issues.Title: System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException occurs on deserialize Calendar
Issues.Body:
* .NET Core 3.0 Preview 4
* Have you experienced this same bug with .NET Framework?: No

<!-- Read https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/blob/master/Documentation/issue-guide.md -->

**Problem description:**

System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException with Message=Type 'System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar' in Assembly 'System.Private.CoreLib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=7cec85d7bea7798e' is not marked as serializable.
ocurrs. Please find the attached sample to reproduce.
[DotNetCore3Calendar.zip](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/files/2986949/DotNetCore3Calendar.zip)



**Actual behavior:** <!-- callstack for crashes / exceptions -->

System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException
  HResult=0x8013150C
  Message=Type 'System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar' in Assembly 'System.Private.CoreLib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=7cec85d7bea7798e' is not marked as serializable.
  Source=System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters
  StackTrace:
   at System.Runtime.Serialization.FormatterServices.InternalGetSerializableMembers(Type type)
   at System.Runtime.Serialization.FormatterServices.<>c.<GetSerializableMembers>b__5_0(MemberHolder mh)
   at System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary`2.GetOrAdd(TKey key, Func`2 valueFactory)
   at System.Runtime.Serialization.FormatterServices.GetSerializableMembers(Type type, StreamingContext context)
   at System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.ReadObjectInfo.InitMemberInfo()
   at System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.ReadObjectInfo.InitReadConstructor(Type objectType, ISurrogateSelector surrogateSelector, StreamingContext context)
   at System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.ObjectMap..ctor(String objectName, String[] memberNames, BinaryTypeEnum[] binaryTypeEnumA, Object[] typeInformationA, Int32[] memberAssemIds, ObjectReader objectReader, Int32 objectId, BinaryAssemblyInfo assemblyInfo, SizedArray assemIdToAssemblyTable)
   at System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.ObjectMap.Create(String name, String[] memberNames, BinaryTypeEnum[] binaryTypeEnumA, Object[] typeInformationA, Int32[] memberAssemIds, ObjectReader objectReader, Int32 objectId, BinaryAssemblyInfo assemblyInfo, SizedArray assemIdToAssemblyTable)
   at System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryParser.ReadObjectWithMapTyped(BinaryObjectWithMapTyped record)
   at System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryParser.ReadObjectWithMapTyped(BinaryHeaderEnum binaryHeaderEnum)
   at System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryParser.Run()
   at System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.ObjectReader.Deserialize(BinaryParser serParser, Boolean fCheck)
   at System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter.Deserialize(Stream serializationStream, Boolean check)
   at System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter.Deserialize(Stream serializationStream)
   at System.Resources.ResourceReader.<>c__DisplayClass44_0`1.<CreateUntypedDelegate>b__0(Object obj, Stream stream)
   at System.Resources.ResourceReader.DeserializeObject(Int32 typeIndex)
   at System.Resources.ResourceReader._LoadObjectV2(Int32 pos, ResourceTypeCode& typeCode)
   at System.Resources.ResourceReader.LoadObjectV2(Int32 pos, ResourceTypeCode& typeCode)
   at System.Resources.ResourceReader.LoadObject(Int32 pos, ResourceTypeCode& typeCode)
   at System.Resources.RuntimeResourceSet.GetObject(String key, Boolean ignoreCase, Boolean isString)
   at System.Resources.RuntimeResourceSet.GetObject(String key, Boolean ignoreCase)
   at System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetObject(String name, CultureInfo culture, Boolean wrapUnmanagedMemStream)
   at System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetObject(String name)
   at WindowsFormsAppCalendar.Form1.InitializeComponent() in \.Net Core 3\Apps\DotNetCore3Calendar\WindowsFormsAppCalendar\Form1.Designer.cs:line 38
   at WindowsFormsAppCalendar.Form1..ctor() in \.Net Core 3\Apps\DotNetCore3Calendar\WindowsFormsAppCalendar\Form1.cs:line 16
   at DotNetCore3Calendar.Program.Main() in \.Net Core 3\Apps\DotNetCore3Calendar\DotNetCore3Calendar\Program.cs:line 19

**Expected behavior:**

Run sample without exception.

**Minimal repro:**

* Unpack the attached sample. 
* Open the DotNetCore3Cal.sln solution in Visual Studio 2019
* Build and run the DotNetCore3Calendar.csproj project - exception raised

Note the WindowsFormsAppCalendar.csproj (.NET Framework 4.0 WinForms project) runs without exception.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationException occurs on deserialize Calendar" (#616)

Issues.Title: Fix GetThemeMargins p/invoke signature (Fix #526)
Issues.Body:
According to the MS docs, the parameter `LPCRECT prc` is missing:
```c
THEMEAPI GetThemeMargins(
  HTHEME  hTheme,
  HDC     hdc,
  int     iPartId,
  int     iStateId,
  int     iPropId,
  LPCRECT prc,
  MARGINS *pMargins
);
```

This PR adds this missing parameter. See also #526.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open PR "Fix GetThemeMargins p/invoke signature (Fix #526)" (#614)

Issues.Title: Add Accessibility.dll to WinForms
Issues.Body:
This is a primary interop assembly for OLEACC.dll.

It's needed because both Winforms and WPF expose public types that depend on the
COM interop types in OLEACC so they cannot embed the types.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Closed or merged PR "Add Accessibility.dll to WinForms" (#593)

Issues.Title: Hardware acceleration for Winforms
Issues.Body:
The Winforms in .NET Framework is using GDI+ to render graphics which is not hardware-accelerated.

Please support a way to use GPU acceleration for Winforms.
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Hardware acceleration for Winforms" (#601)

Issues.Title: Unify namespace macros
Issues.Body:
We need to unify these namespaces macros
WINFORMS_NAMESPACE 
WINFORMS_DESIGN_NAMESPACE
into DRAWING_DESIGN_NAMESPACE

Current name: https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/search?q=DRAWINGDESIGN_NAMESPACE&unscoped_q=DRAWINGDESIGN_NAMESPACE

`DRAWINGDESIGN_NAMESPACE` should be changed to `DRAWING_DESIGN_NAMESPACE`
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Unify namespace macros" (#595)

Issues.Title: Unify common elements in csproj files and import them to prevent human error
Issues.Body:
example:

> Build failed: ```error CS8107: Feature 'default literal' is not available in C# 7.0. Please use language version 7.1 or greater.```
_Originally posted by @JuditRose in https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/diffs_
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "Unify common elements in csproj files and import them to prevent human error" (#594)
